meaningMnemonic: Remember how 心配 means "a worry" and 事 can mean "thing"? Well, if you have a worry over some specific thing, then you probably have some <vocabulary>cares</vocabulary> and <vocabulary>worries</vocabulary>. What are your 心配事 these days?
readingMnemonic: The reading is the reading of 心配 (which you've hopefully gotten down okay by now) and 事 using the (こと) reading. It is rendaku'd, as well, so beware of the ごと (just another 心配事, amiright?).
